content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but I can tell you that some of the most popular and critically acclaimed albums of the recent past include:

- "folklore" by Taylor Swift 
- "After Hours" by The Weeknd 
- "Future Nostalgia" by Dua Lipa 
- "Chromatica" by Lady Gaga 
- "Fetch the Bolt Cutters" by Fiona Apple 
- "Rough and Rowdy Ways" by Bob Dylan 
- "Punisher" by Phoebe Bridgers 
- "What's Your Pleasure?" by Jessie Ware

These are just a few examples of the many great albums that have been released in the past year or so. There's always a lot of diversity in the music industry, and you can always discover new artists and discover new music genres that you might like.
